description: The Nano-Air® Light Hybrid Hoody is made for cool-weather objectives where you’re working hard. With 40-g FullRange® insulation, a flyweight shell and lining fabric, and technical R1® Air knit paneling for warm, stretchy, exceptionally breathable performance for high-exertion, high-elevation activities.
name: Patagonia Nano-Air Light Hybrid Hoody - Mens
